15#ifndef DNS_MASTER_H
16#define DNS_MASTER_H 1
17
18/*! \file dns/master.h */
19
20/***
21 *** Imports
22 ***/
23
24#include <stdio.h>
25#include <inttypes.h>
26
27#include <isc/lang.h>
28
29#include <dns/types.h>
30
31/*
32 * Flags to be passed in the 'options' argument in the functions below.
33 */
34#define DNS_MASTER_AGETTL 0x00000001 /*%< Age the ttl based on $DATE. */
35#define DNS_MASTER_MANYERRORS 0x00000002 /*%< Continue processing on errors. */
36#define DNS_MASTER_NOINCLUDE 0x00000004 /*%< Disallow $INCLUDE directives. */
37#define DNS_MASTER_ZONE 0x00000008 /*%< Loading a zone master file. */
38#define DNS_MASTER_HINT 0x00000010 /*%< Loading a hint master file. */
39#define DNS_MASTER_SLAVE 0x00000020 /*%< Loading a slave master file. */
40#define DNS_MASTER_CHECKNS 0x00000040 /*%<
41 * Check NS records to see
42 * if they are an address
43 */
44#define DNS_MASTER_FATALNS 0x00000080 /*%<
45 * Treat DNS_MASTER_CHECKNS
46 * matches as fatal
47 */
48#define DNS_MASTER_CHECKNAMES 0x00000100
49#define DNS_MASTER_CHECKNAMESFAIL 0x00000200
50#define DNS_MASTER_CHECKWILDCARD 0x00000400 /* Check for internal wildcards. */
51#define DNS_MASTER_CHECKMX 0x00000800
52#define DNS_MASTER_CHECKMXFAIL 0x00001000
53
54#define DNS_MASTER_RESIGN 0x00002000
55#define DNS_MASTER_KEY 0x00004000 /*%< Loading a key zone master file. */
56#define DNS_MASTER_NOTTL 0x00008000 /*%< Don't require ttl. */
57#define DNS_MASTER_CHECKTTL 0x00010000 /*%< Check max-zone-ttl */
58
59ISC_LANG_BEGINDECLS
60
61/*
62 * Structures that implement the "raw" format for master dump.
63 * These are provided for a reference purpose only; in the actual
64 * encoding, we directly read/write each field so that the encoded data
65 * is always "packed", regardless of the hardware architecture.
66 */
67#define DNS_RAWFORMAT_VERSION 1
68
69/*
70 * Flags to indicate the status of the data in the raw file header
71 */
72#define DNS_MASTERRAW_COMPAT 0x01
73#define DNS_MASTERRAW_SOURCESERIALSET 0x02
74#define DNS_MASTERRAW_LASTXFRINSET 0x04
75
76/* Common header */
77struct dns_masterrawheader {
78 uint32_t format; /* must be
79 * dns_masterformat_raw
80 * or
81 * dns_masterformat_map */
82 uint32_t version; /* compatibility for future
83 * extensions */
84 uint32_t dumptime; /* timestamp on creation
85 * (currently unused) */
86 uint32_t flags; /* Flags */
87 uint32_t sourceserial; /* Source serial number (used
88 * by inline-signing zones) */
89 uint32_t lastxfrin; /* timestamp of last transfer
90 * (used by slave zones) */
91};
92
93/* The structure for each RRset */
94typedef struct {
95 uint32_t totallen; /* length of the data for this
96 * RRset, including the
97 * "header" part */
98 dns_rdataclass_t rdclass; /* 16-bit class */
99 dns_rdatatype_t type; /* 16-bit type */
100 dns_rdatatype_t covers; /* same as type */
101 dns_ttl_t ttl; /* 32-bit TTL */
102 uint32_t nrdata; /* number of RRs in this set */
103 /* followed by encoded owner name, and then rdata */
104} dns_masterrawrdataset_t;
105
106/*
107 * Method prototype: a callback to register each include file as
108 * it is encountered.
109 */
110typedef void
111(*dns_masterincludecb_t)(const char *file, void *arg);
112
113/***
114 *** Function
115 ***/
116
117isc_result_t
118dns_master_loadfile(const char *master_file,
119 dns_name_t *top,
120 dns_name_t *origin,
121 dns_rdataclass_t zclass,
122 unsigned int options,
123 uint32_t resign,
124 dns_rdatacallbacks_t *callbacks,
125 dns_masterincludecb_t include_cb,
126 void *include_arg, isc_mem_t *mctx,
127 dns_masterformat_t format,
128 dns_ttl_t maxttl);
129

131dns_master_loadstream(FILE *stream,

133 dns_name_t *origin,

136 dns_rdatacallbacks_t *callbacks,
137 isc_mem_t *mctx);

160 dns_name_t *origin,

184dns_master_loadbufferinc(isc_buffer_t *buffer,

186 dns_name_t *origin,
187 dns_rdataclass_t zclass,

192 dns_loadctx_t **ctxp, isc_mem_t *mctx);

194isc_result_t
195dns_master_loadlexerinc(isc_lex_t *lex,
196 dns_name_t *top,
197 dns_name_t *origin,
198 dns_rdataclass_t zclass,
199 unsigned int options,
200 dns_rdatacallbacks_t *callbacks,
201 isc_task_t *task,
202 dns_loaddonefunc_t done, void *done_arg,
203 dns_loadctx_t **ctxp, isc_mem_t *mctx);
204
205/*%<
206 * Loads a RFC1305 master file from a file, stream, buffer, or existing
207 * lexer into rdatasets and then calls 'callbacks->commit' to commit the
208 * rdatasets. Rdata memory belongs to dns_master_load and will be
209 * reused / released when the callback completes. dns_load_master will
210 * abort if callbacks->commit returns any value other than ISC_R_SUCCESS.
211 *
212 * If 'DNS_MASTER_AGETTL' is set and the master file contains one or more
213 * $DATE directives, the TTLs of the data will be aged accordingly.
214 *
215 * 'callbacks->commit' is assumed to call 'callbacks->error' or
216 * 'callbacks->warn' to generate any error messages required.
217 *
218 * 'done' is called with 'done_arg' and a result code when the loading
219 * is completed or has failed. If the initial setup fails 'done' is
220 * not called.
221 *
222 * 'resign' the number of seconds before a RRSIG expires that it should
223 * be re-signed. 0 is used if not provided.
224 *
225 * Requires:
226 *\li 'master_file' points to a valid string.
227 *\li 'lexer' points to a valid lexer.
228 *\li 'top' points to a valid name.
229 *\li 'origin' points to a valid name.
230 *\li 'callbacks->commit' points to a valid function.
231 *\li 'callbacks->error' points to a valid function.
232 *\li 'callbacks->warn' points to a valid function.
233 *\li 'mctx' points to a valid memory context.
234 *\li 'task' and 'done' to be valid.
235 *\li 'lmgr' to be valid.
236 *\li 'ctxp != NULL && ctxp == NULL'.
237 *
238 * Returns:
239 *\li ISC_R_SUCCESS upon successfully loading the master file.
240 *\li ISC_R_SEENINCLUDE upon successfully loading the master file with
241 * a $INCLUDE statement.
242 *\li ISC_R_NOMEMORY out of memory.
243 *\li ISC_R_UNEXPECTEDEND expected to be able to read a input token and
244 * there was not one.
245 *\li ISC_R_UNEXPECTED
246 *\li DNS_R_NOOWNER failed to specify a ownername.
247 *\li DNS_R_NOTTL failed to specify a ttl.
248 *\li DNS_R_BADCLASS record class did not match zone class.
249 *\li DNS_R_CONTINUE load still in progress (dns_master_load*inc() only).
250 *\li Any dns_rdata_fromtext() error code.
251 *\li Any error code from callbacks->commit().
252 */
253
254void
255dns_loadctx_detach(dns_loadctx_t **ctxp);
256/*%<
257 * Detach from the load context.
258 *
259 * Requires:
260 *\li '*ctxp' to be valid.
261 *
262 * Ensures:
263 *\li '*ctxp == NULL'
264 */
265
266void
267dns_loadctx_attach(dns_loadctx_t *source, dns_loadctx_t **target);
268/*%<
269 * Attach to the load context.
270 *
271 * Requires:
272 *\li 'source' to be valid.
273 *\li 'target != NULL && *target == NULL'.
274 */
275
276void
277dns_loadctx_cancel(dns_loadctx_t *ctx);
278/*%<
279 * Cancel loading the zone file associated with this load context.
280 *
281 * Requires:
282 *\li 'ctx' to be valid
283 */
284
285void
286dns_master_initrawheader(dns_masterrawheader_t *header);
287/*%<
288 * Initializes the header for a raw master file, setting all
289 * values to zero.
290 */
291ISC_LANG_ENDDECLS
292
293#endif /* DNS_MASTER_H */
